alert.note: Alert for Cochise (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 11 at 5:20PM MST until August 11 at 6:00PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 600 PM MST FOR SOUTHWESTERN COCHISE COUNTY... At 520 PM MST, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles east of Whetstone, or 12 miles north of Sierra Vista, moving northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Whetstone, Huachuca City, Fairbank and Charleston. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
